info.name: Àtrous Wavelet Denoising
info.description:
Denoising shadows and reflections using two modified Àtrous wavelet filters with temporal accumulation + TAA.
Non-occluded diffuse indirect light is used and normals are calculated in screen space.

Use the mouse to move the camera!
